title: Buddha's Birthday
Official name: Fódàn (佛誕) , Phật Đản , Chopa-il (초파일, 初八日)부처님 오신 날 , বুদ্ধ পূর্ণিমা  , बुद्ध जयन्ती  , Vesākha
Also called: Buddha's Birthday  ,  Buddha Purnima  ,  Buddha Jayanti
Observed by: Buddhists in East Asia and Buddhists and some Hindus in South and Southeast Asia (as  Vesak )
Significance: Celebrates the birthday of Gautama Buddha
Date (varies by region): 8th day of 4th lunar month (mainland China and East Asia)
first full moon of Vaisakha (South Asia and Southeast Asia)
